mapper.insert: insert into payments (payment_sid, user_sid, amount, currency, payment_method, payment_id, status, paid_at) values (#{paymentSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paidAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update payments set user_sid = #{userSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_method = #{paymentMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_id = #{paymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paid_at = #{paidAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where payment_sid = #{paymentSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select payment_sid, user_sid, amount, currency, payment_method, payment_id, status, paid_at from payments where payment_sid = #{paymentSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select payment_sid, user_sid, amount, currency, payment_method, payment_id, status, paid_at from payments
